user_question: How can nanotechnology be used to improve solar panel efficiency and generate an image of a futuristic solar panel design?
final_answer: Nanotechnology can improve solar panel efficiency by using nanostructures to increase light absorption and reduce energy loss. Image of a futuristic solar panel design generated. Nanostructures increase light absorption by creating a larger surface area and using materials that can trap light more effectively.
